snippet.title: 東方逆妙乱　～ Ephemeral Unnatural Balance English Trailer
snippet.description:
東方逆妙乱　～ Ephemeral Unnatural Balance is a Touhou fan-game currently being developed by Ephemeral Entertainment, created using Danmakufu ph3.

The Touhou fangame where you return balance to the world by breaking the scale. Dodge storms of bullets as you work to discover the source of the abnormality. Tired of playing by the rules? Then change the game - up the risk and reward. Break the balance and embrace Discord.

Want to give the game a try? Download the free demo from https://www.bulletforge.org/u/ozzy/p/dong-fang-ni-miao-luan-ephemeral-unnatural-balance-demo
A Steam demo will become available in the upcoming weeks.

Visit our Steam page here for more information about the game, including a release date: https://store.steampowered.com/app/834580/__Ephemeral_Unnatural_Balance/

You can find out more about EUB and Ephemeral Entertainment as a whole at our Twitter page: https://twitter.com/EphemEntertain

This trailer was created by WishMakers! Check out his channel at https://www.youtube.com/user/Codemaster10001.
